title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 229.3 - Equipment and testing procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 229.3 - Equipment and testing procedures

State Regulations

Each company shall provide each of its testing stations
required by section
229.50
(a)-(d)
of
this Part with equipment fully complying and standardized, maintained, adjusted
and calibrated in full compliance with procedures acceptable to this
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
229.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
